ValidationRule.description: This rule will be used to prevent edits for any closed won or billed opportunity after 6 working days into the month following the estimated billed date. The rule needs to be updated monthly to calculate days.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Billed") ||ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Closed Won")) && ( (DAY(TODAY()) >= 11 && MONTH(Estimated_Billed_Date__c) < MONTH(TODAY()) && (YEAR(Estimated_Billed_Date__c) = YEAR(TODAY()) || YEAR( Estimated_Billed_Date__c ) < YEAR(TODAY())) ))
&& $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Trend")) && NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "PNG")) && Digicel_Country__c <> "Fiji" && Digicel_Country__c <> "Samoa" && Digicel_Country__c <> "Tonga" && Digicel_Country__c <> "Vanuatu"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The time period for editing Closed opportunities has passed. Please log a case for administrator assistance after gaining approval for changes.
